name: transcendentally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is extremely special and unusual and cannot be understood in ordinary ways: I am convinced that music affects the listener transcendentally. It was a transcendentally beautiful experience, watching the ocean crashing onto the rocks below.
More examplesFewer examplesAt the time it was thought that the function of art was to reveal a transcendentally ordered cosmos.I had a sense that I was dealing with things that were transcendentally important.I believe that reality can only be conceived transcendentally.
